domain.square

Class TitleDeedSquare

  • java.lang.Object
    • domain.square.Square
      • domain.square.TitleDeedSquare

  • public class TitleDeedSquare
extends domain.square.Square
    Author:
    Null
    Overview:
    Represents the Title Deed Squares which are special squares of Monopoly game that are can be bought and upgraded.

      • getUpgradeCost

        public int getUpgradeCost()
        Requires:
        -
        Effects:
        Returns the cost of upgrade calculated by the number of houses, hotels and skyscrapers. Returns -1 if the number of houses, hotels and skyscrapers are corrupted.
        Modifies:
        -

      • landedOn

        public void landedOn(Player currentPlayer)
        Specified by:
        landedOn in class domain.square.Square
        Requires:
        currentPlayer is not null.
        Effects:
        If the currentPlayer is not the owner of this square and has enough money to pay, it pays the rent to the owner. If the currentPlayer is not the owner of this square and has no money to pay, it goes bankrupt. If the currentPlayer is the owner of this square, nothing happens.
        Modifies:
        currentPlayer
